spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout is recognizable (kitchen/dining left, living central/top, bedrooms right, bath central-right, laundry bottom-left), but several plan-to-model mismatches reduce accuracy. The living room appears undersized relative to kitchen/dining compared to the stated areas in the 2D plan (E4). Hallway/circulation geometry is simplified and widened in places, altering wall alignment around the bathroom/closet zone (E4/E2). Multiple door locations and swing orientations do not cleanly match the 2D plan (notably the laundry/closet cluster and the bath/closet doors) (E2/E3). Window placement is inconsistent: Bedroom 2’s exterior windows appear redistributed (right wall count/positions differ; bottom-wall window from plan not represented) (E2).

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacencies mostly hold (bath off hall; bedrooms off hall; kitchen open to living), but small service spaces are not faithfully preserved. The closet/laundry/entry cluster is structurally simplified, and at least one closet is not clearly represented as a discrete enclosed room per the plan (E1). Door embedding is inconsistent (several doors read as oversized and/or not seated correctly in wall thickness) (E6). Window openings also do not match the plan’s distribution (E2). No clear hallucinated extra room volume, but internal partitions are altered enough to count as structural deviation.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture types are broadly plausible (dining set, sofa/coffee table, beds, bath fixtures), but mapping to the 2D icons is loose. Some items are scaled/positioned in ways that don’t reflect the tighter plan proportions (e.g., living seating zone and bedroom clearances) (E4). Bedroom 2’s desk/bed arrangement does not clearly match the plan’s intended layout (E2).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is coherent and readable with generally clean geometry. However, several door elements appear visually incorrect (odd swings/intersections/oversized leafs), indicating modeling artifacts (E6). Lighting is acceptable but somewhat flat; edges/openings lack crispness. Projection is perspective-isometric rather than strict orthographic isometric.

detected_errors.description: Proportion distortion: kitchen/dining reads too large and the living room too small relative to the 2D plan’s stated room areas; hallway widths/circulation area also appear inflated.
Wall alignment/partition mismatch around the central hall–bath–closet zone: internal wall runs are simplified/shifted compared to the 2D plan.
Missing/unclear room: one of the plan’s closets (notably the left/bottom service-side closet adjacent to laundry) is not clearly modeled as a distinct enclosed closet volume.

Incorrect window placement: Bedroom 2 window distribution differs from the plan (plan indicates an exterior window on the bottom wall; render emphasizes right-wall windows and does not clearly show the bottom-wall window).
Door orientation error: several door swing directions (laundry/closet/bath cluster) do not match the plan’s hinge/swing depiction.
Rendering/modeling artifact: multiple doors appear oversized and/or not properly embedded in wall thickness (visual intersections/awkward placements).
